Body:
image_ref = image.copy()
if not boolean:
    image_ref[0:2] = 0
    image_ref[1][4] = 1
    image_ref[-1] = 0
    image_ref[:, (0)] = 0
    image_ref[:, (-1)] = 0
else:
    image_ref[0:-1, 2:7] = 0
    image_ref[2:7, 1:-1] = 0
result = cut_image_circle(image, inverse=boolean)
assert result.shape == image_ref.shape
assert (result == image_ref).all()
